# AstroNvim User Configuration Example

A user configuration template for [AstroNvim](https://github.com/AstroNvim/AstroNvim)

## üõ†Ô∏è Installation

### Simple Install

```shell
curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marco-souza/astronvim/main/install.sh | sh
```

#### Start Neovim

```shell
nvim
```
